name: Meowtastica Playable Demo Build 0.3 English
description:
Hello everybody! I want to present you a demo of my game Meowtastica.

Meowtastica is an 2D Action - Adventure game. Collect coins, fight enemies, defeat bosses, look for secrets playing as a Bubble Cat. Become a true hero!

- 4 locations
- 3 bosses
- 3 types of weapons
- 3 endings

Known bugs:
- Bug on the first boss

Known Issues:
- The problem with art and graphics :)

* The game uses free assets. Please contact me if I have not indicated you in the credits or if I violated any license.

* I apologize if I make any mistakes in English
